title: Keep Normals Draft and Replace Blind With Team Builder
body:
Please. No one likes the speed copy pasta fest that is blind.

And no one wants to be forced into ranked.

replies.body: more people use blind draft than normal draft, why get rid of blind if it's more used?

There's no such thing as blind draft. 

Team builder allows blind picking without having to call your role.

Ok let me change that one word to "pick" instead of "draft", back to my statement, why get rid of the more used mode and keep the not used very much mode?

Because that statement doesn't give a decent reasoning.
We're not getting rid of a mode. Team Builder is just an improvement of blind pick.

Not really, i prefer blind over teambuilder and draft. So how's it an improvement? 

Your opinion doesn't = everyones.

And I prefer team builder over blind for reasons already stated.

Your opinion doesn't = everyones.

Since my opinion falls into the majority instead of the minority, it kind of does within this situation, nice try though.

Since blind is more used.

Majority =/= everyone. Same with minority.

Nice try tho.

Now quit being condescending and actually get back on topic.
I believe this is what they call to be 'hoisted by one's own petard.'
still team builder had a very low population compared to blind at the time.

Because Blind is cancer. It is the most toxic game structure/setup imaginable. The Draft mode helped prevent this. There's a reason why Worlds is being played this way rather than Bland. Painfully obvious reasons.
Ok, Then is why is used far more than draft?

The blind picking part is the worst part about blind pick. I like blind pick because it has super fast queue times + a super short championselect and working fill system, team builder has non of that. If team builder should really return it should replace draft pick normals.
well im not sure about getting rid of blind draft, but i love the idea about bringing back team builder, it definitely helped me learn new champs and learn about that role
There's no such thing as blind draft.
well blind draft exists in rotating game modes.

Blind means you do not get to see the enemy team and there are no bans.

Draft means there are bans and the teams take turn picking, so you can see the enemy team.

There is no such thing as blind draft.
Ever played Ascension? it uses blind draft where each team get 3 bans, afterwards its regular blind pick except 6 champs are banned
If you want to consider the draft part only the ban part, then yes, it would fit. I define draft as the bans and being able to see the enemy team tho.
This is what Riot called it, not me

> [{quoted}](name=KiyoSpirit,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4xXmwRKA,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-09T06:27:38.938+0000)
>
> Blind means you do not get to see the enemy team and there are no bans.
> 
> Draft means there are bans and the teams take turn picking, so you can see the enemy team.
> 
> There is no such thing as blind draft.

Actually, Blind Draft does exist; it's the champion select mode that's used for modes such as URF (and variants, but not random), One For All and I believe also Hexakill. There's banning phase, then afterwards there's a blind pick-esque picking phase where everyone picks at the same time while not being able to see the other side.
Yeah we mentioned that above.
URF is blind draft, it's even what it's called.
I'll take your word for it since I can't check :P
lol i meant blind pick

Isnt it better to remove shitty Normal Draft that nobody plays and is exact same fucking copy of Ranked without 1 single original thing, and replace it with Team Builder which also has you select roles but actually has something original to it. They will never never remove Blind, understand that, its played by the majority of players...
I dont even care about team builder with the new champ select, but I do not want to be forced to play ranked. I would much rather just play normals without going into the hellhole of blindpick
RIOT PLEASE! we need team builder back

I don't get what was wrong with Team Builder mode. You got to pick the champ you wanted, and as long as you were patient enough, got them in the ROLE you wanted. While in Blind Pick, you're lucky to get your preferred spot once every blue moon. And even then, another player will most likely argue with you over it. (I may be wrong, having gone to Normals Draft since it's inception to escape the salty nightmarish wasteland of Blind Pick.)

But if you don't want to play a certain role blind pick was basically your only option, because let's face it, if you select fill in draft you will be support. Another reason for blind pick is that you can influence the role that your going to fill (choice between adc and supp, quickly writing jgl after top and mid get selected, etc.).

> [{quoted}](name=Leeerzeichen,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4xXmwRKA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-09T07:04:58.114+0000)

Another reason for blind pick is that you can influence the role that your going to fill (choice between adc and supp, quickly writing jgl after top and mid get selected, etc.).

Like I said in my comment, I may be wrong on my views of Blind Pick, because I often got placed with less-than-friendly people so I might have been a bit biased in my feelings on it.

Because people want to play overpowered Champions that are banned in any sane game.

Because of the stupid need to have X amount of Champions to be able to play Draft (they really should either give all >1000 IP Champs for free to new accounts or expand the free Champion rotation pool).

The latter suggestions would've been far, faaar better than just removing Draft altogether.
getting rid of all non-ranked draft is a good thing. force all people to play ranked means more less time waiting for your role selection and higher chance of getting your main pick
